bibliographic-data.invention-title: Computer Implemented Method and Apparatus for Establishing and Executing a Dynamic Equity Instrument

abstract.p: Equity returns, expenses, and risk in a real estate asset are shared dynamically between an investor and an owner of rights. In one of several computing system based embodiments, holding the real estate asset is considered to be a joint venture, contributions by the owner and the investor to the joint venture are calculated periodically, and residual accounts or payments are adjusted to balance out the venture. Some of the residual accounts may exist outside of the conventional capital structure consisting of various debt and equity interests associated with the asset.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: COMPUTER IMPLEMENTED METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR ESTABLISHING AND EXECUTING A DYNAMIC EQUITY INSTRUMENT
COMPUTER IMPLEMENTED METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR ESTABLISHING AND EXECUTING A DYNAMIC EQUITY INSTRUMENT.
METODO IMPLEMENTADO POR COMPUTADORA Y APARATO PARA ESTABLECER Y EJECUTAR UN INSTRUMENTO DE EQUIDAD DINÁMICO.

abstract.p: Equity returns, expenses, and risk in a real estate asset are shared dynamically between an investor and an owner of rights. In one of several computing system based embodiments, holding the real estate asset is considered to be a joint venture, contributions by the owner and the investor to the joint venture are calculated periodically, and residual accounts or payments are adjusted to balance out the venture. Some of the residual accounts may exist outside of the conventional capital structure consisting of various debt and equity interests associated with the asset.
Los retornos de capital, gastos y riesgo en un activo de bienes raíces se comparten dinámicamente entre un inversionista y un propietario de derechos

en una de varias modalidades de sistemas informáticos, conservar el activo de bienes raíces se considera una sociedad en participación, las contribuciones por parte del propietario y el inversionista a la empresa conjunta se calculan periódicamente y las cuentas o pagos residuales se ajustan para compensar la sociedad
algunas de las cuentas residuales pueden existir fuera de la estructura convencional de capital que consisten en diversos intereses sobre la deuda y sobre el capital asociados con el activo.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: COMPUTER IMPLEMENTED METHOD AND APPARATUS FOR ESTABLISHING AND EXECUTING A DYNAMIC EQUITY INSTRUMENT
PROCÉDÉ MIS EN OEUVRE PAR ORDINATEUR ET APPAREIL D'ÉTABLISSEMENT ET D'EXÉCUTION D'UN INSTRUMENT DE CAPITAUX PROPRES DYNAMIQUE

abstract.p: Equity returns, expenses, and risk in a real estate asset are shared dynamically between an investor and an owner of rights. In one of several computing system based embodiments, holding the real estate asset is considered to be a joint venture, contributions by the owner and the investor to the joint venture are calculated periodically, and residual accounts or payments are adjusted to balance out the venture. Some of the residual accounts may exist outside of the conventional capital structure consisting of various debt and equity interests associated with the asset.

Les rendements, les dépenses et le risque de capitaux propres dans un actif immobilier sont partagés de façon dynamique entre un investisseur et un titulaire de droits. Dans l'un de plusieurs modes de réalisation à base de système informatique, la détention de l'actif immobilier est considérée comme étant une co-entreprise, des contributions par le titulaire et l'investisseur à la co-entreprise sont calculées périodiquement, et des comptes ou paiements résiduels sont ajustés pour équilibrer l'entreprise. Certains des comptes résiduels peuvent exister en dehors de la structure capitalistique constituée de divers intérêts de la dette et de capitaux propres associés à l'actif.
